name: Hurst Meadow
description:
Hurst Meadow a point-and-click game where you go on a short journey to a British park and experience its usual dog-and-goose scene. Except now you're walking in two art students' shoes. You can explore the place, interact and discover interesting and odd things around. 

This game is very short, and will take approximately 15-20 minutes to finish! 

Inspired by our visit to the actual place, located in Surrey, United Kingdom.

   

Art & Programming: Kelly Liang

Music: Rosemary's Garden by Peter Crosby
